answers.answer: Hey, you should call your ob and let them know what's going on.
I went to my dr and told her she said that's normal.. I feel like I wasted my time even telling her

U need to immediately! Tell ur dr..that can be signs of preeclampsia..it can happen at any point of pregnancy and its deadly...this can cause ur organs to start shutting down starting with ur kidneys..seek help ASAP just to make sure u dont  put baby at risk and urself.

question: Hi there this morning I noticed a tightness in both my legs so I went to the bathroom and Im completely swollen hands and from the knees down. . What is causing this?? Does anyone know?  Help ; (
title: I woke up swollen
